content.text: Hey, not much. Just working on my latest video edit.
It's for a client. They're a restaurant and they wanted a video for their website.
Oh, cool! That sounds like fun. What kind of video?
It's a short video about the restaurant and their food. I'm having a lot of fun with it.
That's great! I love editing videos. It's so creative.
Me too! It's my favorite thing to do.
What kind of computer do you have?
I have a desktop computer. It has a fast processor and a lot of memory.
Nice! I have a laptop, but I want to get a desktop computer too.
Desktop computers are great. They're a lot more powerful than laptops.
Yeah, I know. I'm really excited to get one.
You should! It's a great investment.
Yeah, I know. I'm going to get one soon.
